introduction.title: About Us
introduction.subTitle: A software development company with a thirst for excellence

description.title: Diverse minds, creating world-class software
description.subTitle: Our impressive portfolio was built from 200+ kinds of brilliance
description.description: In the technology world, there's no room for tunnel vision. Flawless technology solutions are only crafted when different points of view, cross-functional expertise, and years of experience unite and collaborate. This is exactly what the 200+ minds at Niteco enjoy doing.

socially.title: Social Responsibilities
socially.subTitle: Socially responsible, environmentally aware
socially.description: Our Scandinavian roots call out for us to act responsibly towards society and the environment. Our power to bring sustainability to people and communities motivates us to do even better.
